get.summary: Get All Deactivation Events for an Account
get.description:
**Description:** Retrieves all service changes to all mobile numbers subscribed to a client's account, including deactivations and and ported numbers.

**Use Case:** This API allows clients to check if a number is still with the person who originally opted in for messaging. If the number has been re-used by a carrier, the returned data will show that result.

parameters.name: EventDate
parameters.description: Date to be checked for events.

parameters.name: EventType
parameters.description: The event type can be *Deactivated* or *Ported*.

parameters.name: CountryCode
parameters.description: Country Code is not required to retrieve deact events for US numbers. Currently, SBT only has deact data for US numbers.

parameters.name: pageNumber
parameters.description: Number of pages in the query return.

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: Number of items on each returned page.

200.description:
App Code  | Description
----------------|---------
gen.1200 | Request successful

400.description:
App Code  | Description
----------------|---------
dea.1002| To Date cannot be greater than Current Date
dea.1003| Invalid EventType
dea.1004| Unsupported CountryCode
dea.1005| Event type is required

500.description:
App Code  | Description
----------------|---------
gen.1500 | Internal Error
